question: if we are performing wadoo, if adhaan starts should we give reply or not? please explain in detail
answer:
QUESTION

if we are performing wadoo, if adhaan starts should we give reply or not? please explain in detail

ANSWER


Share:

One should reply the Adhaan while making Wudhu. (Fataawa Mahmoodiyah vol.12 pg.44; Fataawa al-Fikhiyyat al-Kubraa vol.1 pg.61)

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
